question:
Consider the following:
  1. To combat deforestation and soil erosion
  2. To provide better food security to the world
  3. To conserve the Bio-diversity
The use of Bio-fuels would help in which among the above issues?
explanation: Biofuel is considered as an alternative to diesel fuel. It is used for other purposes also i.e. hydrogen needs, clean up oil, work as cooking oil etc. It can work as a replacement of energy needs starting from vehicle fuel to central home heating.
